attributes.action: Stop the closure and sale of Eskdale School
attributes.additional_details:
NYCC will be making a decision on having a public  consultation on the 9th of Febuary about this, we would like a say and stop the closure of this beloved school! 

Losing Eskdale School would be a huge loss to the community!
attributes.background: Eskdale school is a small secondary school located on the East Side of Whitby. The school is highly rated by students and parents. Closure of the school would mean that students would have to transfer to Caedmon College. The sale of the land would be a huge loss to the local community.We want a say!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on school closures are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://www.northyorks.gov.uk/article/24003/Petitions---information-and-advice
